title: Professor of Psychology, Distinguished Professor of Neuroeconomics, Director, Center for Neuropolicy, Director, Facility for Education and Research in Neuroscience (FERN)
research_focus_description: Dr. Berns' research focuses on the neuroimaging of human decision making and canine cognitive function using awake fMRI. His work aims to map the perceptual and decision systems in both humans and dogs and explore the neurobiology underlying decision making and preferences.
